p: The beginning material of silage, DDM, DMI, and RFV are given in Table 7. DDM values of alfalfa silages were determined as between 68.50% and 71.89%. The level of DDM calculated through ADF contents ( Table 3) of silages in CMN3 group increased with the decrease of ADF content, while decreased with the increase of ADF contents in CMN5 group. DMI was found out to be 3.62, 4.26, and 3.84 in CON, CMN3, and CMN5 respectively, and it was determined that DMI was higher in groups with cumin essential oil addition (p<0.05).
